roleset.name: separate with walls
roleset.note: WALL_OFF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'wall off' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from wall.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: usually without arg2?
example.text: But even before Wang's latest financial troubles surfaced, [some customers]-2 ``were trying [*-2]to wall off their Wang installations'' so other departments wouldn't add Wang, says Chris Christiansen, a former Wang marketer who is now a market analyst with Meta Group, a market research firm in Stamford, Conn.
example.arg: so other departments wouldn't add Wang

example.name: passive with arg2
example.text: [John's bedroom]-1 is walled off *trace*-1 from the rest of the house.
example.arg: from the rest of the house
